relation.text: September 24 th - My dear dear Friend ! I hasten
found on my return to Town on that day
will be in about ten Days
had mentioned my intention of doing , on the 6 th of September
now expected ease -- but to my great mortification , found
Monday had the right tooth taken
carried Lord Carlisle to Eton some Days
now in my power , for they are the best and most friendly kind people that ever existed
stay till the 20 th of October
rememb er her -- what a loſs to you ! to her Sisters ! but an irreparable one to her Children ! this has been a fatal year
Summer to Ladies in that situation -- Mrs Jackson what a loſs to everybody who knew
writes but once in a year or two
remember me to Miſs Cadogan -- To Mr D Taxal Chapel le Frith Derbyshire Mrs Dickenson Seper . 1786
